data.message: Research synthesis for The Fashanus: Created comprehensive RESEARCH_SYNTHESIS.md with insights from boarding school syndrome, family systems theory, parentification, mixed-race identity development, and Nigerian diaspora dynamics. Includes specific character improvements and 5 research-driven conflict storylines.
data.outcome: Created comprehensive RESEARCH_SYNTHESIS.md with insights from boarding school syndrome, family systems theory, parentification, mixed-race identity development, and Nigerian diaspora dynamics. Includes specific character improvements and 5 research-driven conflict storylines.
